points: Developed a system to deposit checks in Java using test driven development.
Quickly learned the project and how every layer integrated together.

Worked closely with developers to design test plans.

Automated tests, cleanup, and updates using bash scripts.
Successfully led groups of children through fun and enjoyable activities.

Communicated with other staff to solve problems.
Managed time and exceeded job quotas.
Quickly trained on wood working machines.
Worked well independently with minimal supervision.
